table.Name: wcms_IP
table.Title: a_menu_ip
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = (select count(0) from wcms_IP { where IP_IP <o> @Search:IP_IP }) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 15 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [IP_ID] ,[IP_IP] ,[IP_Date] ,[IP_Note] ,case when [IP_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [IP_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[IP_ID] ,[IP_IP] ,[IP_Date] ,[IP_Note] ,[IP_A] from wcms_IP { where IP_IP <o> @Search:IP_IP } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update wcms_IP set [IP_A]= @active where IP_ID = @editID select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: delete from wcms_IP where IP_ID = @delID select 1
